articles.title: Area-by-area Covid breakdown as northern Lincolnshire records tragic 200th hospital death - Grimsby Live

articles.content:

articles.title: Canada adds 72 more coronavirus deaths as 4 provinces report record high case numbers - Global News
articles.description: To date, Canada's total coronavirus infections stands at 325,409 and its death toll at 11,406.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Supervaccine' that fights coronavirus and the flu could be available in as little as a year - Daily Mail
articles.description: Professor Ronald Eccles, who ran Cardiff University's Common Cold Centre for almost 30 years, said there was no insurmountable hurdle to combining the two jabs in one shot.

articles.title: China's 'bat woman' reveals new tests which suggest coronavirus did NOT originate at her Wuhan lab - Daily Mail
articles.description: Shi Zhengli, the deputy director of the Wuhan Institute of Virology, recently retested blood samples taken in 2012 from four miners who fell ill after working in bat caves in southwest China.
articles.content:
A Chinese virologist famous for her research on coronavirus in bats has shared new tests which suggest the virus did not originate at her lab in Wuhan.

articles.title: Coronavirus cases in Quebec reach 130,000, deaths at 6,806 - CTV News Montreal
articles.description: Quebec reported Saturday that 130,888 people have now tested positive for COVID-19 in the province and 6,806 people have died due to the disease since the start of the pandemic.
articles.content:
MONTREAL --
